about_the_game:
The War has Begun! Welcome to the exciting world of Explottens, a thrilling and action-packed game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! In this unique title, players take control of a team of adorable cats as they embark on an epic adventure filled with danger, excitement, and tons of explosive fun!



For years, Captain K (code named K.I.T), had worked tirelessly for the army, undoubtedly the best pilot cum secret agent they acquired. K.I.T along with his loyal band of sidekicks fought villains to keep the citizens of Katmandu safe. After a long, eventful journey as a captain, K.I.T bid goodbye to his position and retired to a life of peace, quiet, and most importantly his PlayStation. However, in an unexpected turn of events K.I.T is forced to pull up his socks and take the skies again as evil awaits him. With the help of his ragtag group of misfits, K.I.T will face all his previous enemies who have joined forces to form an evil organization K.L.A.W, all set to destroy the world of Katmandu. Witness whether K.I.T is able to defeat K.L.A.W in the deadliest fight Katmandu has ever seen, and save the world once again.



Defeat your enemies in this heart pumping, pawtastic shoot 'em up as you zip, boost, and shoot through the sky fighting your ferocious felines. The most accessible arcade game where each mission is uniquely crafted for you. Introducing assistive mode where you can turn on the auto-aim, and sit-back and relax for a while. Double the chaos as you unlock fighting gear, special abilities, planes, and a lot of many sidekicks to provide cover against the evil bosses, each one more brutal than the other. The fight is meow so emerge undefeatable in this catacular adventure. Blast through different missions because the future of Katmandu lies in your hands. May the Force be with you!

In this unique title, players take control of a team of adorable cats as they embark on an epic adventure filled with danger, excitement, and tons of explosive fun!

After a long, eventful journey as a captain, K.I.T bid goodbye to his position and retired to a life of peace, quiet, and most importantly his PlayStation. With the help of his ragtag group of misfits, K.I.T will face all his previous enemies who have joined forces to form an evil organization K.L.A.W, all set to destroy the world of Katmandu. The fight is meow so emerge undefeatable in this catacular adventure. Blast through different missions because the future of Katmandu lies in your hands. May the Force be with you!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Explottens: Rise of K.L.A.W

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defeat your enemies in this heart pumping, pawtastic shoot 'em up as you zip, boost & shoot through the sky fighting your ferocious felines. Unlock different missions and sidekicks to provide cover and some comic relief and emerge undefeatable in this catacular adventure. May the Force be with you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
